flavorText:
"There are two ways for me to pass this gate. One involves you remaining conscious."
—Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

foreignData.name: Torwächter der Unterwelt
foreignData.text: Wenn der Torwächter der Unterwelt aus dem Spiel auf dem Friedhof landet, bestimmt jeder Spieler eine Kreatur, die er kontrolliert, und begräbt diese.

foreignData.name: Gardien de la porte des abysses

name: Abyssal Gatekeeper
originalText: If Abyssal Gatekeeper is put into any graveyard from play, each player chooses and buries a creature he or she controls.

rulings.text: The “sacrifice a creature” effect is not targeted. It can affect creatures with protection from black, for example.
The player whose turn it is chooses a creature to sacrifice, then each other player in turn order chooses a creature to sacrifice, then all chosen creatures are sacrificed at the same time.

text: When Abyssal Gatekeeper dies, each player sacrifices a creature.
